name: Klaustastrophe
description:
Short action-puzzle game made for TAPE#1 Jam in 2 weeks.
This games contains 30 levels in total, 3 bosses and 3 simple mechanics.
Available in english and polish language.

The princess of the Potato kingdom has been kidnapped by a mean sausage named Klaus, who wants to force her to marry in order to take over the rule of Potatoland. Only Colonel Potato can stop him!

Online version may have some disadvantages that does not occur in desktop version like slower level and elements loading times.

Music by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi).
https://xdeviruchi.itch.io/8-bit-fantasy-adventure-music-pack
